actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A joint resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the "Constitution for the State of New Columbia Approval Act of 1987".

summary.text: States that the Congress disapproves of the action of the District of Columbia Council in passing the Constitution for the State of New Columbia Approval Act of 1987.

titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the "Constitution for the State of New Columbia Approval Act of 1987".
